description.narrative:
The Project's objective is to contribute to meet Viet Nam's increasing power demand in an environmentally sustainable and socially inclusive manner.
The Project's scope is the construction of Song Bung 4 hydropower project in compliance with ADB's safeguard requirements and the restoration and improvement of livelihoods of Project affected people.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased power generation capacity in Quang Nam Province through sustainable use of hydropower, and mitigation of adverse environmental and social impacts.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Addition of 1,000 MW of Hydropower generation capacity in Quang Nam Province without significant outstanding environmental and social issues.

description.narrative: Increased power generation capacity in Quang Nam Province through sustainable use of hydropower, and mitigation of adverse environmental and social impacts.
